description:
NVIDIA to fully transition to the open-source GPU kernel modules with the upcoming NVIDIA 560 graphics driver for Linux systems.

The post NVIDIA 560 Linux Graphics Driver to Fully Adopt Open-Source GPU Kernel Modules appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: NVIDIA 560 Linux Graphics Driver to Fully Adopt Open-Source GPU Kernel Modules
